entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
